title: Daily Weather in 26 World Cities
description: This dataset spans 3 years and includes daily weather measurements for 26 cities worldwide. It comprises 17 weather parameters, making it suitable for both multi-variate and single-series forecasting tasks. With data from January 2020 to December 2022, it's an ideal resource for forecasting the 'temperature' series while leveraging other weather measurements as potential exogenous factors.

target.name: weather_descriptions
target.description: [Cloudy, Partly cloudy, Sunny, Patchy rain possible, Overcast, Moderate rain at times, Moderate or heavy rain shower, Heavy rain at times, Light freezing rain, Moderate or heavy snow showers, Patchy moderate snow, Moderate snow]

features.name: maxtemp
features.description: Maximum temperature for the day in Celcius.

features.name: mintemp
features.description: Minimum temperature for the day in Celcius

features.name: avgtemp
features.description: Average temperature for the day in Celcius

features.name: sunhour
features.description: Duration between sunrise and sunset in hours

features.name: wind_speed
features.description: Maximum wind speed in kilometers per hour

features.name: in_northern_hemisphere
features.description: Whether the city is in northern hemisphere. This is a static covariate.

features.name: in_southern_hemisphere
features.description: Whether the city is in southern hemisphere. This is a static covariate.
